column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Seriously this was the best ramen place in houston so far. I've tried
column3: tiger den and some other ramen places but it doesn't compare to this. If you live around houston
column4: then this ramen place is to go! I got the spicy tonkatsu with corn and it was amazing! I didn't even have to add in any spice or anything! Â
